content.raw:
The lidar's range should be [0.1,30] instead of [0.08,10]. The lidar's angular resolution should be 0.25, right now it's 0.281 (180/640) - at the current measurement range of 180 deg you need 720 samples instead of 640 to get a resolution of 0.25. In theory the lidar's full field of view would be 270 degree (with 1080 samples) but given that the kick-off drawing also only has a 180 degree fov BDI/CR might be limiting it to 180deg?

Also, the spindle speed setting should consider the real hardware's limitations (1.25 to 50 RPM afaik).

The lidar's range should be [0.1,30] instead of [0.08,10]. The lidar's angular resolution should be 0.25, right now it's 0.281 (180/640) - at the current measurement range of 180 deg you need 720 samples instead of 640 to get a resolution of 0.25. In theory the lidar's full field of view would be 270 degree (with 1080 samples) but given that the kick-off drawing also only has a 180 degree fov BDI/CR might be limiting it to 180deg?

Also, the spindle speed setting should consider the real hardware's limitations (1.25 to 50 RPM afaik).
